| PARAMETER | char PARAMETER(N\_PROF, N\_CALIB, N\_PARAM, STRING16);<br>PARAMETER:long\_name = "List of parameters with calibration information";<br>PARAMETER:conventions = "Argo reference table 3";<br>PARAMETER:\_FillValue = " ";|Name of the calibrated parameter. | SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_EQUATION | char SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_EQUATION(N\_PROF, N\_CALIB, N\_PARAM, STRING256);<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_EQUATION:long\_name = "Calibration equation for this parameter";<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_EQUATION:\_FillValue = " ";<br> | Calibration equation applied to the parameter.<br>Example :Tc = a1 \* T + a0|
| SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COEFFICIENT | char SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COEFFICIENT(N\_PROF, N\_CALIB, N\_PARAM, STRING256);<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COEFFICIENT:long\_name = "Calibration coefficients for this equation";<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COEFFICIENT:\_FillValue = " "; | Calibration coefficients for this equation.<br>Example :a1=0.99997 , a0=0.0021|
| SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COMMENT | char SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COMMENT(N\_PROF, N\_CALIB, N\_PARAM, STRING256);<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COMMENT:long\_name = "Comment applying to this parameter calibration";<br>SCIENTIFIC\_CALIB\_COMMENT:\_FillValue = " "; |Comment about this calibration<br>Example :The sensor is not stable|
